subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: As Alabama and Oregon seem destined to play for a national championship, Crimson Tide Coach Nick Saban has questioned whether the Ducks’ no-huddle offense is a risk to player safety.
snippet: As Alabama and Oregon seem destined to play for a national championship, Crimson Tide Coach Nick Saban has questioned whether the Ducks’ no-huddle offense is a risk to player safety.
